pullrequest.title: Add tutorial for implementing a system plugin.

content.raw:
I moved the example to the `examples/plugins/system_plugin` folder, and used doxygen `\snippet` in the markdown file. I also added the tutorial to the `tutorials.md` file.

I’ll upload the documentation to our doc server after we get Addisu’s PR in. If you’re interested, there are instructions here: [https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-webui](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-webui/src/default/)
content.html:
I moved the example to the examples/plugins/system_plugin folder, and used doxygen \snippet in the markdown file. I also added the tutorial to the tutorials.md file.

I’ll upload the documentation to our doc server after we get Addisu’s PR in. If you’re interested, there are instructions here: https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-webui
